title: 404 Not Found
body: This challenge is suitable for you if you just started with coding. The challenge will test your basic CSS and HTML skills.

title: My team page
body: This challenge will test your basic CSS skills and get it to next level. You will work with basic HTML element to make a simple but yet elegant team page.

title: Interior Consultant
body: Your challenge is to create a simple interior consultant homepage. This challenge will test your skill in styling navigation and positioning.

title: Recipe page
body: Everyone loves food, especially cheesecake. In this challenge, you will work with a recipe of your choice or given one.

title: My Gallery
body: Inspired by instagram, in this challenge you will work with a similar design to instagram profile page.

title: Checkout Page
body: In this challenge, you will work with the form in a modern and minimal design. The challenge will bring your HTML and CSS to a new level.

title: Edie  homepage
body: Homepage is a popular task that a developer has to do. In this challenge, you will work with Edie - a small team providing web services.

title: Portfolio
body: A portfolio is the most important certificate when applying to a job. In this challenge, you will create a beautiful portfolio page.
